title: The Thousand and One Nights: Volume 1
author: Anonymous / Traditional Middle Eastern Folk Tales
genre: Fiction, Folk Tales, Fantasy, Classic Literature
description: A classic collection of Middle Eastern and South Asian folk tales compiled over centuries. The frame story follows Scheherazade, who tells a series of captivating stories to delay her execution by the king. Volume 1 includes many early tales featuring adventure, romance, and moral lessons. The work has inspired countless adaptations worldwide.
